welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hamburg, a city known for its stunning harbor, rich maritime history, and vibrant cultural scene. We hope you'll take the time to explore all the charm and beauty this city has to offer."

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 4-hour time limit per session.
